doc.name: VariableDelay
doc.description: This actor delays its inputs by a variable delay. It works in a similar way as the TimedDelay actor except that the amount of time delayed is specified by an incoming token through the delay port (a parameter port). If the delay is zero, then this actor only increments the microstep, not the model time. If a negative delay is specified, then an exception is thrown.
doc.author: Jie Liu, Haiyang Zheng
doc.property: The amount specifying delay. Its default value is 1.0.
